CommentBody: The customer requested the call at 8 pm IST today (14th of June) if it is possible. My slots next week also do not work for them

The customer called in asking for an urgent call as they wanted an update on the ticket.
They requested a call to the number +919738447520.
The customer requested the call for the upgrade process on July 19th at 2 PM IST

last week the customer had planned an upgrade during APAC working hours, this week it is during EMEA working hours.
Make sure that a meeting is planned before the upgrade, and ensure they plan ahead for available time.

The client demands meeting here and now.
They have some post-upgrade issues, most of which could be solved if they read actual instructions.
Meeting plan:

Review post-upgrade environment
Take notes of any errors
Attempt to solve some of them
Ensure that they have published reports working
Ensure their setting for emails are properly set.

Odd that SA was upgraded to NEA 11.6.0.86 but AIC was not.

Data Collection  SG_LocalAdmins job did not seem to light up with what the Custom SOX Policy Center >> ITGC SOX >> Test job>> [Table name  SG_LocalAdmins_Result_AsMemberOf] reporting was trying to report on.

Meeting plan:

Look at their Weak Passwords job, check if the default table has the data they need
If not, suggest creating a custom job, or pulling data from some other job into a custom report
client followed up via vm. will notify engineer assigned.
